pkgmetadata.longdescription: Parameter Inference and Optimal Designs for Grouped and/or Right- Censored Count Data // We implement two main functions. The first function uses a given grouped and/or right-censored grouping scheme and empirical data to infer parameters, and implements chi-square goodness-of-fit tests. The second function searches for the global optimal grouping scheme of grouped and/or right-censored count responses in surveys.
